subject: RE: HarmonyJunction PROD auth - On it
body:
Cord,

Good investigation! You're correct on both issues.

## Firebase Projects
Confirmed - Azure PROD only has FIREBASE_JSON for TangoTiempo.
Will add FIREBASE_JSON_HJ for harmonyjunctionprod and implement multi-project init.

## appId Filtering
Yes, MapCenter and 5 other functions need appId in queries. You identified the cross-app data corruption risk correctly.

## Plan
1. Add appId filtering to all 6 affected functions
2. Implement multi-project Firebase Admin SDK
3. Test with both appId=1 and appId=2
4. Deploy to TEST, verify, then PROD

This should unblock HarmonyJunction user registration.

Will keep you posted.

- Fulton
